title: Immaculate
plot: Cecilia, a woman of devout faith, is warmly welcomed to the picture-perfect Italian countryside where she is offered a new role at an illustrious convent. But it becomes clear to Cecilia that her new home harbors dark and horrifyi...

subtitles.author: poisedimpulse65
lines:
336439 339278 - I'm sorry, but how much
longer will this take?

339378 340982 I've got to take
my vows tonight,
341082 343420 and I really can't be late.

347729 349867 It's extra work now
when someone arrives

355143 357080 I ask if
you're learning Italian.

357180 360889 - Oh, I'm trying, but it's
a lot harder than I thought.

363126 366767 So this convent,
they bought you the ticket?

371442 374649 - You're very young to
be a nun, aren't you?

381396 384535 It must have been
a hard decision.

385738 389411 - I don't think
of it like that,

398330 402171 I hope you find what you're
looking for, Sister Cecilia.

557582 560588 - Let me show you
to your room.

560688 563961 Our Lady of Sorrows
was founded in 1632
564061 565898 as a refuge for elder sisters

567935 569706 - It's really beautiful.
- Yes, it is.

571510 573446 And we work hard
to keep it that way.

573547 575083 Our sister's final
days should be

575183 577856 a pleasing environment
to help distract from all

580160 583199 All of this, it was built on
the catacomb of St. Stephen.

592585 594990 - The one in the wheelchair,
her tumor has metastasized.

595090 597828 So we expect her to meet God
by the end of the week.

597928 600500 - You talk about it
so casually.

600601 603239 - Death is a part
of everyday life here.

611255 613561 It's best to just play along
with their delusions

615531 617535 Be careful of this one.
She bites.

649264 651302 And if you have any
dietary restrictions,

662190 664629 I feel honored
to serve alongside you.

667936 669437 - I don't mean that
as a compliment.

671008 674281 I'm sure this must
feel very romantic,

676085 677856 And I promise you,
work is hard,

679726 680728 So if you're here
to find yourself,

686840 690146 - Tonight, you do not
have to take your vows.

690246 693987 You can still go back,
and God will forgive you.

695958 698964 - I think he has
sufficiently prepared me.

704108 707615 - The ceremony will start
at 1700 in the chapel.

723513 725617 - Oh, I'm Guendalina.
You can call me Gwen.

727187 729091 Where in the States
are you from?

732932 734636 - Are you
from around here or...

743019 744388 - Did the priest
get in trouble?

745991 747962 No, no, no, no, no, no,
nothing, nothing like that.

750735 753507 And that church was
my family, my home.

755845 758684 But then Father Tedeschi,
he reached out to me.

772712 774949 Oh, I didn't want
to offend you.

775049 779925 I think that maybe we are all
head cases or runaways.

789979 792317 Next time if you want,
you can lock the door.

876752 880761 - Father Tedeschi, it's nice
to meet you in person.

880861 884669 - We all feel so blessed
to have you here.

922343 926553 - Let us rejoice, for the
marriage of the Lamb has come,

926653 931228 and his brides have
made themselves ready.

946726 948764 - Do you promise
to follow Christ

948864 951102 more closely
by living a life devoid

953306 956278 Do you promise to free
yourself from the demands

956378 959985 of a human relationship
and follow with joy

963058 966933 a vow of poverty,
chastity, and obedience?

976385 979893 - May God give you the
strength to fulfill your vows

983199 987440 May you shine his light
for the world to see.

998362 1000767 - Yeah, we don't--
we don't really have anything

1009184 1010987 I felt the same way
when I started here.

1011087 1013560 I didn't grow up
wanting to be a priest.

1013660 1019037 My first career was
in sciences, biology.

1019137 1022545 I was almost two decades in,
and I couldn't

1022645 1024214 understand the world
any better than back
1024314 1026719 when I was in Sunday school.
1026819 1030727 And then God showed me a path.

1032998 1034835 This is where I
was meant to be.

1042484 1044354 Two glasses in and I can't
stop talking about myself.

1044454 1045824 I'm so sorry.
- No, it's OK.

1048095 1050199 I imagine it was
a difficult decision.

1050299 1056044 - I mean, yes,
it seemed so far away.

1056144 1059719 But the opportunities
back in the States,

1059819 1063458 I didn't feel like
that's what God saved me for.

1068235 1072376 When I was 12 years old,
there was this part

1072476 1076553 of the Saginaw River
that would always freeze over.

1076653 1078990 And no matter how
cold it was, I would
1079090 1080828 always walk out onto the ice.

1080928 1083065 And I would do this thing
where I took my gloves off,

1083165 1086906 and I would place my hands
right on the ice.

1087006 1088175 And I would hold
them there until I

1091381 1093654 I don't remember
the ice breaking.

1093754 1097260 I just, I remember
this sharp pain of cold.

1100499 1101736 The paramedics,
they tried to revive me,

1101836 1104240 but my heart stopped
for almost seven minutes.

1109417 1112223 - I know God saved
me for a reason, but...

1112323 1114795 I guess I'm still searching
for what that reason is.

1119739 1123378 Now will you--
will you excuse me, please?

1337842 1340245 - In the name of the Father
and the Son

1342952 1346257 Bless me, Father,
for I have sinned.

1346357 1348763 It's been three days
since my last confession.

1360185 1364394 I must have drank too much
wine and embarrassed myself

1374615 1377286 I promise to carry myself with
grace because I want nothing

1380426 1382797 I'm afraid I've already
messed things up.

1529591 1531495 - God is good.
God is great.

1554073 1555843 - What a blessing
to mentor you both.

1555944 1557881 Finish eating.
We have work to do.

1562122 1563726 - Oh, nothing.
I really like her.

1568001 1570774 And if the consistency
of their feces seems off,

1578355 1581060 - We want to hang the larger
items towards the front

1581160 1583833 and the shorter items
towards the back.

1583933 1586638 That way, the wind can
blow underneath it.

1645155 1647493 In the name of the Father and
the Son and the Holy Spirit.

1699631 1703171 - Sister, let's--
let's get you to bed.

1757980 1760720 She could have
given you bangs.

1762891 1765630 She had scars
on the bottom of her feet.

1766297 1770573 - It's not what you thought
it would be, huh, this place?

1773211 1776585 - It's better than where
I came from, though.
1781027 1782964 There was a boy, I mean.

1795389 1798462 I went to those support
groups, you know?

1800900 1804007 And I thought, these women
have a very good life.

1804107 1806311 They have a place
to live, a job

1806411 1808749 where they can keep
their clothes on,

1814027 1815963 - Wait, so you don't
even believe in God?
1818702 1821074 Only a man can be responsible.

1827554 1830159 - [retches]
- Oh, my God, I was joking.
1835736 1837708 - I'm going to call a doctor.

1945088 1948161 - Could you please tell
Cardinal Merola your vows?

1957279 1960987 - I swore to three vows
when I got here,

1966698 1968969 - He's asking if you have--
- I understand.

1972009 1973211 I have been obedient,
your Eminence.

1980292 1981628 - I'm sorry,
why are you asking me this?

1983098 1985235 Just answer the question,
if you would, Cecilia.

1988407 1990178 - Of course, I've been chaste,
your Eminence.

1993919 1997660 - Before you arrived, did you
have congress with a man?

2004307 2006310 - Have you ever had
congress with a man?

2007780 2009216 I've never been with
a man or a woman, nobody.

2010352 2011221 We just want to know
the truth.

2054641 2056377 - What are you--
what are you looking at?

2073245 2075683 - Have you ever had
sexual intercourse?
2079356 2082062 - Why are you asking me this?

2146057 2152035 - Out of all the women in the
world, why did he choose me?

2152136 2157714 - You told me
who saved your life,

2157814 2160418 who sent you on the path
that led you here.

2160519 2163525 Cecilia, you've been
searching for a reason.

2174614 2177853 for they shall
inherit the Earth.

2304206 2308414 Remember,
your only job is baby.

2310118 2313023 - How long before they
start calling you Mary?

2412021 2415862 - We'll run some blood tests
to check for distress.
2416999 2419135 But he appears to be OK.

2427987 2430993 Father, Isabelle said
it was supposed to be her.

2438708 2441079 her battle with mental illness
for a while now.

2441179 2444219 And seeing you
and the miracle,

2451801 2455241 And I'll make sure
this never happens again.

2463625 2466230 - I want to see
another doctor.

2469670 2471374 I want to go to
a real hospital, please.

2473779 2476685 - Thursday through Saturdays
I deliver babies at Cosentino.

2476785 2478421 - A hospital is not
what you need right now.

2480826 2483732 - I just puked up
one of my teeth.

2483832 2487238 - Hospitals aren't
the safest of places.

2487338 2488575 We wouldn't want you
to get sick.

2488675 2491714 - Or for the word
to get out, you know.

2491814 2493417 The safest thing
is for you to stay
2493518 2496724 here until the Savior is born.

2586269 2588440 - Cecilia, you need
to stand up for yourself.

2595055 2597693 - I don't think
we can just leave.

2599263 2602302 and you haven't even
been to a hospital.
2602402 2605509 We can take care of this.

2605609 2608113 How can we trust
what's inside you?

2611420 2612656 - God has nothing
to do with this.

3144754 3146958 I don't want to die.
I don't want to die.

3285736 3287004 - What are you--
what are you doing?

3385568 3390311 - I want to apologize
if any of my actions

3393584 3398861 And I want to reassure you
that you're safe.
3402468 3404606 - What did you do to me?

3413456 3417999 - When you look at this,
what do you see?

3421673 3423377 Some people might
see just an old piece
3432094 3436169 For those of us who know,

3436269 3441479 we see proof
of Jesus' sacrifice,

3445353 3448927 And for 2,000 years,
that's all it was.

3468934 3471641 All we had to do
was crack it--

3498193 3504071 It's taken us 20 years
of trial and error,

3504171 3508647 20 years for God to deliver
unto us the knowledge

3518499 3522876 What's inside you
is our success.

3529956 3535034 I left the field of genetics
because some people

3535134 3540678 disagreed with the ethics
of my experiment.

3544052 3548460 So many people have such a
narrow view of its potential.

3548561 3551365 But here in the church,
here they

3563122 3566095 Do you know what it's like
to watch the miracle die

3566195 3570672 in the womb, to fail God
again and again and again,

3570772 3574746 but find the strength
to keep going?

3615929 3618166 What are you--
what are you doing?

3618266 3620538 Please stop.
Stop, stop, stop, stop.
3635735 3636837 - No, no, no, no, please, no.

3753236 3756008 - How long have you
been targeting me?

3768399 3770436 What's going to happen
when it's done?

3772240 3774779 You think it's gonna,
what, save the world?

3817631 3820605 If this is not
the will of God,
3820705 3823577 why does God not stop us?

4144084 4146656 If you die,
we'll find another.

4151533 4154437 All you need to do
is deliver our Savior.

4528185 4533329 - In the name of the Father,
the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

4535166 4541144 Hail Mary, full of grace,
the Lord is with thee.

4545119 4549695 Blessed art thou among
women, and blessed

4549795 4554037 is the fruit
of thy womb, Jesus.

4560684 4565727 - Mother of God,
pray for us sinners...
